summary: "Thor's Fight with the Giants" is a painting by Mårten Eskil Winge from 1872. Thor, an important god in Germanic mythology, is known for his hammer, Mjölnir, and his strength. He protects people, controls weather, and is popular in Norse stories. Thor has many names, a family including wife Sif and sons Magni and Móði, and famous battles, like the one with the serpent Jörmungandr. His symbol, Mjölnir, was worn by Vikings. Today, Thor is still remembered in place names, the word "Thursday," and modern art and culture.
title: Thor
